mdx.rawBody:
Song		thamizhukkum amudhendru pEr
Singers		P Suseela
Lyrics		Bharathidasan
Music		MS Viswanathan - TK Ramamoorthy
Film		panjavarNakkiLi
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n3 S

thamizhukkum amudhendru pEr
g  p m   g   rg rs   s  sp.

andha thamizh inba thamizh engaL uyirukku nEr,  uyirukku nEr
p.p.  d. s    d.s  r  g    r g   gm d  p  dpmgr	gm d  p  m2pg

Stanza 1:	
thamizhukku nilavendru pEr
g  m d   p  p p p   d  m

inba thamizh engaL samoogaTHin viLaivukku neer
g m  r  m    m p   m g  m g    r g  s  s  rgp

thamizhukku maNamedru pEr
m2 p m2  p  m2p m2 d  pmgr

inba thamizh engaL vAzhvukku nirumiTHa oor
r g  n. r    gpmg  g   g  g  g m g m   rgr

thamizhukku madhuvendru pEr
s  g g   rs s gr r   d. d.s

inba  thamizh engaL urimaiCHem payirukku vEr    payirukku vEr
p.p.  d. s    d.s   rg rg g    g m d  p  dpmgr	g m d  p  m2pg

Stanza 2:
thamizh engaL iLamaikku pAl
gr g    rsr   gp p   p  m2p

inba thamizh nalla pugazh mikka pulavarkku vEl pulavarkku vEl
p p  g  p    dp m  g g    g  g  g m r   g  mdp m2p g   m  dp

thamizh engaL uyarvukku vAn
m2 p    p p   m2p m2 g  gm2dm2g

inba thamizh engaL asadhikku CHudar thandha thEn  CHudar thandha thEn
r r  s  g    g r   rp p   m  gr g   s   s   s gr  r  pm  g   rs  s gm

Stanza 3: (notes similar to Stanza 2)
thamizh engaL arivukku thOL
inba thamizh engaL kavidhaikku vayiraTHin vAL
thamizh engaL piravikku thAi
inba thamizh engaL vaLamikka uLamutra thee

thamizh engaL piravikku thAi
n. r    gpmg  g g g  m  gmgpmr

inba thamizh engaL vaLamikka uLamutra thee
n.r  m2 m2   m2m2  m2m2dp p  rg r  s  s gm
